name: 100 Doors Incredible Puzzle
description:
Meet the sequel of 100 Doors - one of the most popular mobile puzzle game of all time!
In “100 Doors Incredible” you’ll be challenged by many tricky levels in room escape games genre.

Our new puzzle game has stunning graphics, excellent sound effects and an unforgettable atmosphere. You will be pleasantly surprised by variety of levels where fascinating puzzles combine with classic hidden objects mechanics.

The game is definitely one of the best in 100 Doors (100 Rooms) genre.
You’ll get hidden objects, tricky puzzles and difficult tasks.

Game features:
- exciting challenges;
- great graphics;
- excellent sound effects;
- regular updates;
- the game is free and always will be.

How to play:
- open the door to complete the level;
- use abilities of your device such as tilt, shake, swipe, tap to solve the puzzles;
- find and use items.


If you're having any problems or questions feel free to contact us at support@ninjapublishing.com
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ninjapublishing/
